Published: 09:11 16 Feb 2024 AEDT Arrow Minerals Ltd (ASX:AMD) will release a share purchase plan to raise up to $500,000. The company garnered shareholder approval to proceed with the offer at the company’s general meeting and accordingly, the SPP offer is now open. A letter is being sent to eligible Arrow shareholders and those who have provided an e-mail address will be sent an e-mail communication regarding the SPP Offer. Eligible shareholders who have not provided an e-mail address or have requested physical copies of document will receive the SPP Offer documentation and personalised application form via post.
